Title: Beer Heist
Writer: Scotty Landes, Blake Anderson (creator), Adam DeVine (creator), Anders Holm (creator), Kyle Newacheck (creator), Connor Pritchard (creator), Dominic Russo (creator), Dominic Dierkes (story), Sean Clements (story)

Plot: The guys go to any length to impress college girls.
